set filename

ENV
func:
const data = msg.payload

let process_env = {
    BOT_NAME: data.bot_name,
    BOT_TOKEN: data.bot_token,
    OPENAI_API: data.openai_api,
    PIPECONE_API: data.pipecone_api,
    PIPECONE_ENV: data.pipecone_env,
    PIPECONE_INDEX: data.pipecone_index,
    PRIVATE_TG_CHAT:data.private_chat
}

global.set("process_env", process_env)
return msg;
